about_the_game:
Laufen Und Raufen is a chaotic brawler game for 2-8 players.
Take control of your penguin of choice in various game modes and fight your opponents with your almighty flippers!




  • Play with or against your friends with up to 8 players in 2-4 teams!
  • Show your mighty skills in a competitive brawler game with varied game modes!
  • Playful and fun gameplay needs a snappy and cool art style – and we got both covered!
  • Choose from a variety of different penguin costumes to match your personality!
  • Push penguins… into holes! It’s always fun. Especially if you want to spite your friends!
  • Design your own levels using the built-in level editor. Express your ar(c)tistic side!
  • Expecting ice, sand or going to the moon? No?! Well, you should! The environments of Laufen Und Raufen are rich and diverse.
  • Use the game’s easy to pick up controls to reign over your opponents. We know you can do it!




  • Fish Fight: Collect all of the fish from your opponents, but beware - the others intend to do the same
  • Push-ball: Play the aggressive football of the arctic. Score as many goals as possible before the time runs out!
  • Deathmatch: Take you aggression out on your friends as you push as many of your opponents as possible into holes before the clock strikes zero
  • Time Attack: You could never get enough fish now can you? Well, prepare your flippering self to collect the most fish before the time ends
  • All 4 The Fish: What happens when everyone has to fight over one single fish? That's right! An epic battle with flipper action par excellence! So which team could capture the one coveted fish?
  • Boss: Team up to fight against the biggest penguin or better yet, play as the aforementioned giant penguin and show the puny adversaries who wears the penguin-pants in this house!



However you want to play, if you think the cold never bothered you anyway, then get ready to get your flippers on!

Laufen Und Raufen is a chaotic brawler game for 2-8 players.
Take control of your penguin of choice in various game modes and fight your opponents with your almighty flippers!




  • Play with or against your friends with up to 8 players in 2-4 teams!
  • Show your mighty skills in a competitive brawler game with varied game modes!
  • Playful and fun gameplay needs a snappy and cool art style – and we got both covered!
  • Choose from a variety of different penguin costumes to match your personality!
  • Push penguins… into holes! It’s always fun. Especially if you want to spite your friends!
  • Design your own levels using the built-in level editor. Express your ar(c)tistic side!
  • Expecting ice, sand or going to the moon? No?! Well, you should! The environments of Laufen Und Raufen are rich and diverse.
  • Use the game’s easy to pick up controls to reign over your opponents. We know you can do it!




  • Fish Fight: Collect all of the fish from your opponents, but beware - the others intend to do the same
  • Push-ball: Play the aggressive football of the arctic. Score as many goals as possible before the time runs out!
  • Deathmatch: Take you aggression out on your friends as you push as many of your opponents as possible into holes before the clock strikes zero
  • Time Attack: You could never get enough fish now can you? Well, prepare your flippering self to collect the most fish before the time ends
  • All 4 The Fish: What happens when everyone has to fight over one single fish? That's right! An epic battle with flipper action par excellence! So which team could capture the one coveted fish?
  • Boss: Team up to fight against the biggest penguin or better yet, play as the aforementioned giant penguin and show the puny adversaries who wears the penguin-pants in this house!



However you want to play, if you think the cold never bothered you anyway, then get ready to get your flippers on!

name: Laufen Und Raufen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Gamepads Recommended

short_description: Laufen Und Raufen is a chaotic brawler for 2-8 players about penguins pushing each other and fighting over their fish. Compete with each other or work together as a team to rule the Arctics!
